Detailed Description

CharTable stores the mapping table between characters from one type to another.

Member Function Documentation

bool jma::CharTable::loadConfig ( const char *  fileName,
MeCab::Iconv &  iconv 
)

Load the configuration file, such as "map-kana.def", which is in text format.

This file contains the mapping table between one type to another, which format is "LeftType RightType".

Parameters:
fileName the file name
iconv to convert the input file's encoding type to run time encoding type
Returns:
true for success, false for fail
Attention:
if this function is already called before, the table previously loaded would be removed.

const char * jma::CharTable::toLeft ( const char *  str  )  const

Convert character to the left type, other character not in the right type is returned as 0.

Parameters:
str the character string
Returns:
if str is in the right type, its left type equivalent is returned, otherwise 0 is returned

const char * jma::CharTable::toRight ( const char *  str  )  const

Convert character to the right type, other character not in the left type is returned as 0.

Parameters:
str the character string
Returns:
